name: UCableComponent
doc: Component that allows you to specify custom triangle mesh geometry

bAttachStart:
Should we fix the start to something, or leave it free.
If false, component transform is just used for initial location of start of cable
bAttachEnd:
Should we fix the end to something (using AttachEndTo and EndLocation), or leave it free.
If false, AttachEndTo and EndLocation are just used for initial location of end of cable
AttachEndToSocketName: Socket name on the AttachEndTo component to attach to
EndLocation: End location of cable, relative to AttachEndTo (or AttachEndToSocketName) if specified, otherwise relative to cable component.
NumSegments: How many segments the cable has
SubstepTime: Controls the simulation substep time for the cable
SolverIterations: The number of solver iterations controls how 'stiff' the cable is
bUseSubstepping: When false, will still wait for SubstepTime to elapse before updating, but will only run the cable simulation once using all of accumulated simulation time
bEnableCollision:
EXPERIMENTAL. Perform sweeps for each cable particle, each substep, to avoid collisions with the world.
Uses the Collision Preset on the component to determine what is collided with.
This greatly increases the cost of the cable simulation.
CollisionFriction: If collision is enabled, control how much sliding friction is applied when cable is in contact.
CableForce: Force vector (world space) applied to all particles in cable.
CableGravityScale: Scaling applied to world gravity affecting this cable.
CableWidth: How wide the cable geometry is
NumSides: Number of sides of the cable geometry
TileMaterial: How many times to repeat the material along the length of the cable

methods.name: GetAttachedActor
methods.doc: Gets the Actor that the cable is attached to *

methods.name: GetAttachedComponent
methods.doc: Gets the specific USceneComponent that the cable is attached to *

methods.name: GetCableParticleLocations
methods.doc: Get array of locations of particles (in world space) making up the cable simulation.

methods.name: SetAttachEndTo
methods.doc: Attaches the end of the cable to a specific Component within an Actor *

methods.name: SetAttachEndToComponent
methods.doc: Attaches the end of the cable to a specific Component *
